h2_title: Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you have 3 focus points already banked, you can also quickly unleash a charged strike with the Thrust Stance to stagger him out of, but your reaction speed will need to be very quick.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you have 3 focus points already banked, you can also quickly unleash a charged strike with the Thrust Stance to stagger him out of, but your reaction speed will need to be very quick.
